The First

19 April 2017 written by Muhammad D. Ramadhan

I was told to write and read a lot for pleasure so I start doing it right away. See if I could feel it myself. It is meant to be a personal blog, lots and lots of stuff I am interested in would be written on it. Well, I hope you will find it interesting.

I am just hobbyist, developing web application for money. Nothing special.

Oh yeah, I have respect for cute girls, philosophy and good stories (the most tragic ones).
